about_the_game:
Dive into RYBot, where you play as a resourceful robot on a mission to revitalize a network of machines across enchanting islands. Your challenge? Master color theory! Each level presents a fresh puzzle, blending color mixing with evolving mechanics, this casual yet challenging game will electrify your puzzle-solving skills. Ready to complete the circuit?

Collect Color Batteries to change your player's color. Combining primary colors will give you access to secondary and tertiary colors.


Match the Gate color to open it.


Use Color Filters to filter out a color from your player.


Use the Invert Switch to invert all colors on the level to their complimentary color. This does not affect the player.


and more !
detailed_description:
Dive into RYBot, where you play as a resourceful robot on a mission to revitalize a network of machines across enchanting islands. Your challenge? Master color theory! Each level presents a fresh puzzle, blending color mixing with evolving mechanics, this casual yet challenging game will electrify your puzzle-solving skills. Ready to complete the circuit?

Collect Color Batteries to change your player's color. Combining primary colors will give you access to secondary and tertiary colors.


Match the Gate color to open it.


Use Color Filters to filter out a color from your player.


Use the Invert Switch to invert all colors on the level to their complimentary color. This does not affect the player.


and more !
name: RYBot Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Revitalize a world of machines across multiple islands in this captivating puzzler. Unlock new mechanics in 40 levels, blending strategy and color theory. Get ready for an electrifying color adventure!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
